title: Google\Cloud\Translate\V3\DetectLanguageRequest
name: DetectLanguageRequest
description:
The request message for language detection.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.translation.v3.DetectLanguageRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. Project or location to make a call. Must refer to a caller's project. Format: projects/{project-number-or-id}/locations/{location-id} or projects/{project-number-or-id}. For global calls, use projects/{project-number-or-id}/locations/global or projects/{project-number-or-id}. Only models within the same region (has same location-id) can be used. Otherwise an INVALID_ARGUMENT (400) error is returned.

params.name: data.model
params.description: Optional. The language detection model to be used. Format: projects/{project-number-or-id}/locations/{location-id}/models/language-detection/{model-id} Only one language detection model is currently supported: projects/{project-number-or-id}/locations/{location-id}/models/language-detection/default. If not specified, the default model is used.

params.name: data.content
params.description: The content of the input stored as a string.

params.name: data.mime_type
params.description: Optional. The format of the source text, for example, "text/html", "text/plain". If left blank, the MIME type defaults to "text/html".

params.name: data.labels
params.description: Optional. The labels with user-defined metadata for the request. Label keys and values can be no longer than 63 characters (Unicode codepoints), can only contain lowercase letters, numeric characters, underscores and dashes. International characters are allowed. Label values are optional. Label keys must start with a letter. See https://cloud.google.com/translate/docs/advanced/labels for more information.
